item.title: Learn About DoSell From Budapest, Budapest, HU
item.description:
Learn About DoSell From Budapest, Budapest, HU

DoSell was founded by a diverse group of professionals, who despite specializing in different fields and having varied business backgrounds, had all experienced similar frustrations while trying to achieve the business and operational excellence that leads to success. Yes, we've been there!

item.title: B2B reference guide for company makers
item.description:
B2B reference guide for company makers

DoSell's Development and Implementation Platform connect companies with audited Product Design, Engineering, Software Development and Global Market Access Advisory service providers to accelerate growth and efficiency. DO WHAT YOU LOVE - WE DO THE REST

item.title: Six Month Challenge - Life experiments
item.description:
Six Month Challenge - Life experiments

This is the table of contents for my 6-month startup journey.

item.title: This Is How You Design Your Mobile App for Maximum Growth
item.description:
This Is How You Design Your Mobile App for Maximum Growth

Kamo Asatryan may very well be one of the best kept secrets in the startup ecosystem. He's one of a small handful of people who have observed hundreds of mobile apps, thought deeply and scientifically about their mechanics, and determined what they could change to grow faster.

item.title: Here's Why You Should Care About Holacracy
item.description:
Here's Why You Should Care About Holacracy

This article is by Adam Pisoni, co-founder and former CTO of Yammer. He is also a founder of Responsive.org, a new movement dedicated to helping companies become more agile, adaptive and empowering. I recently spent a month embedded at a consultancy called Undercurrent, watching how they help organizations become more adaptive and responsive.

item.title: Bethlehem Steel's Hoover-Mason Trestle
item.description:
Bethlehem Steel's Hoover-Mason Trestle

Listen to steelworkers' stories, watch historic films, and discover the legacy of Bethlehem Steel.

item.title: Holm Marcher & Co. | CSS Winner
item.description:
Holm Marcher & Co. | CSS Winner

Holm Marcher & Co., a headhunting agency, asked us to create a website that would engage and excite talent, especially within the creative industry.

item.title: Web Design in 2016: The Future is High Definition
item.description:
Web Design in 2016: The Future is High Definition

The prevalence of HD displays today is no coincidence, and design is pairing with new and imaginative visual techniques to bring these details to life. But applying HD to web design can be as intricate as the fine details in its displays.

item.title: Slack Is Investing Millions in Slack Bot Startups to Make Chat the Operating System of the Future
item.description:
Slack Is Investing Millions in Slack Bot Startups to Make Chat the Operating System of the Future

What do you do if you've raised $340 million in venture capital and you don't necessarily need all of it to run your business? Well, you could set some of that money aside and invest it in other companies. That's what trendy workplace chat vendor Slack is doing.
